definitions.definition: To clothe and ornament ; to adorn or attire .
examples: He was arrayed in his finest robes and jewels.

definitions.definition: To lay out in an orderly arrangement; to deploy or marshal .
To set in order, as a jury, for the trial of a cause; that is, to call them one at a time.

main_definition: To clothe and ornament ; to adorn or attire .
secondary_definitions: To lay out in an orderly arrangement; to deploy or marshal .
( law ) To set in order, as a jury, for the trial of a cause; that is, to call them one at a time.
